attributes.additional_details:
In his short life, Stephen Sutton has not only inspired other Cancer Sufferers, he has also raised almost 3 million pounds and the total is growing all the time.
This young man is an inspirational Briton and we feel that he deserves a kinighthood for his endeavours.
There is little time and the wheels must move quickly, as never before.
Please acknowledge the young man's achievement with the honour before it is too late.
